thread.title: Uber competitor Didi expands from China to Brazil

title: Uber competitor Didi expands from China to Brazil
text:
Uber competitor Didi expands from China to Brazil Wednesday, January 03, 2018 - 00:51 
China's ride-hailing application Didi Chuxing has agreed to acquire a majority stake in Brazilian app 99, newspaper Valor Economico said on Wednesday, citing sources familiar with the talks.
